description: This file defines a Flutter widget called BaseScaffold, which provides a responsive layout with top bar, side navigation, and bottom navigation for a fitness management application. It includes logic for rendering different navigation items based on user roles and integrates with application state and routing.

classes.name: BaseScaffold
classes.description: A responsive scaffold widget with top bar, side or bottom navigation, and main content area.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the scaffold including app bar, body, and navigation.

methods.name: _navItems
methods.description: Generates a list of navigation items based on user roles.

classes.name: _TopBar
classes.description: A custom AppBar widget with notification icon, user role display, and menu options.

classes.name: _SideNav
classes.description: A vertical side navigation menu showing navigation options.

classes.name: _BottomNav
classes.description: A bottom navigation bar for narrow screens.

classes.name: _NavItem
classes.description: A data class representing individual navigation items with label, icon, and target path.

methods.description: Constructs the layout including app bar, side nav, and main content.

methods.description: Specifies the preferred size of the top app bar.
